verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Uturehemu ee Bwana kwa kuwa (sisi) tumetenda
dhambi tumetenda dhambi x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu unioshe nitakase maovu yangu,unitakase
na dhambi zangu zote uisafishe roho yangu.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mimi nimeyajua nimejua makosa yangu,na dhambi
yangu i mbele daima i mbele yangu daima.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu uniumbie uniumbie moyo safi,uifanye roho
iliyoulia upya ndani ya nafsi yangu.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu unirehemu sawa na fadhili zako, kiasi cha
wingi wa rehema zako uyafute makosa yangu.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Ee Mungu uniumbie uniumbie moyo safi,uifanye
roho iliyotulia upya ndani ya nafsi yangu.
